tool_description: 40+ Languages News Search, Trending articles feed.
name: Webit News Search
title: Webit News Search

api_list.name: Trending
api_list.description:
Get a continuously updated, rich feed of articles finely picked by a sophisticated A.I.

Try it live at: https://webit.re/services/internet-search/news-search-api/tryout

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Offset to start getting results from.

For example, if you search 10 articles at a time (number=10), then you should set offset=0 for page 1, offset=10 for page 2, offset=20 for page 3 and so on.

optional_parameters.name: language
category
optional_parameters.description: [COMING SOON (APRIL 2021) - It is currently ignored] Category to restrict articles by.

optional_parameters.name: from_sources
optional_parameters.description: [PREMIUM - PRO+ plans only] Comma separated list of sources hosts to pick news from. For instance: \"nytimes.com, digitaltrends.com, ...\", etc. This will exclude any other source.

optional_parameters.name: number
has_image
optional_parameters.description: Set this to \"True\" in order to get only articles having an image associated to. Default is \"False\".

optional_parameters.name: exclude_sources
optional_parameters.description: [PREMIUM - PRO+ plans only] Comma separated list of sources hosts to exclude from the results. For instance: \"nytimes.com, digitaltrends.com, ...\", etc.

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description:
Search in a continuously updated database containing millions of articles finely crawled minute by minute from sources selected by a sophisticated A.I.

Try it live at: https://webit.re/services/internet-search/news-search-api/tryout

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: String including the search terms to seek articles for

optional_parameters.name: language
exclude_sources
optional_parameters.description: [PREMIUM - PRO+ plans only] Comma separated list of sources hosts to exclude from the results. For instance: \"nytimes.com, digitaltrends.com, ...\", etc.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: [COMING SOON (APRIL 2021) - It is currently ignored] Category to restrict articles by.

optional_parameters.name: from_sources
optional_parameters.description: [PREMIUM - PRO+ plans only] Comma separated list of sources hosts to pick news from. For instance: \"nytimes.com, digitaltrends.com, ...\", etc. This will exclude any other source.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Offset to start getting results from.

For example, if you search 10 articles at a time (number=10), then you should set offset=0 for page 1, offset=10 for page 2, offset=20 for page 3 and so on.

optional_parameters.name: has_image
optional_parameters.description: Set this to \"True\" in order to get only articles having an image associated to. Default is \"False\".

optional_parameters.name: number
